greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for Pi * sqrt(2).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(Pi*sqrt(2)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b063447.txt", n, " ", x[n])) \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 21 2009
(MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(150)); R:= RealField(); ContinuedFraction(Pi(R)*Sqrt(2)); // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 16 2018
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jul 24 2001
